American History: The study of the political, social, and cultural development of the United States.
European History: The study of the past in the European continent, from antiquity to the present.
Global & Transnational History: The study of historical connections and interactions that transcend national borders, including empire and migration.
History of Science, Technology & Medicin: The study of how scientific knowledge, technological systems, and medical practices have developed and shaped society.
Pre-Modern History (Ancient/Medieval): The study of human history from antiquity through the early modern period.
